item.title: How to Create a React-Electron Application From Scratch
item.description: In this step-by-step tutorial, we’ll create a simple React-Electron application from scratch. Electron is a framework that allows you to build cross-platform desktop applications using web technologies such as HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. React is a popular JavaScript library for building user interfaces. I use this clean template as a boilerplate for my projects. TLDR Go to repo electron-react-template click Use this template to create a new repo and start coding.
